snippet: The retirements of Edward K. Eisler and David B. Heller are the latest high-level departures from Goldman Sachs, which is going through a post-financial crisis transition.
abstract: The retirements of Edward K. Eisler and David B. Heller are the latest high-level departures from Goldman Sachs, which is going through a post-financial crisis transition.

headline.main: 2 Securities Heads Are Latest to Leave Goldman
